comments:
Everytime I synchronize my workspace, I get this error: An internal error occurred during: "Refreshing workspace".  When I look in the error log, I see the message below.

I am using Eclipse RC6 with WebTools.

When I do a manual refresh of the projects, then I don't get any errors.  The only time I get these errors is when I do a team Synchronize.  My projects are configured using CVS.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-06-06 07:43:10.281
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Refreshing workspace".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.getStore(FileSystemResourceManager.java:353)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.getStore(Resource.java:1066)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.refreshResource(FileSystemResourceManager.java:722)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.refresh(FileSystemResourceManager.java:710)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.refreshLocal(Resource.java:1400)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.refresh.RefreshJob.runInWorkspace(RefreshJob.java:141)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.InternalWorkspaceJob.run(InternalWorkspaceJob.java:38)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Are you sure you get this error when you perform a Team>Synchronize? The error is clearly coming from a local refresh. Is there any other errors in your error log?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 144499 ***
